name: Trials of the Ball God
description:
You are the new, up and coming Greek God Of Balls, Bolar. In order for you to ascend to Mount Olympus and take place next to legendary Greek Gods, you  must first finish the labyrinth that the God of Math, Apollo has put you in. Turned into a ball by Apollo, find and complete the trials of the labyrinth and ascend to Mount Olympus.

Credits:

Adam Daniel - Designer

Wan Hazwan & Selina Lim - Programmer
